headline: Uber Technologies, Inc. (UBER) Expands Its Reach Across Mobility, Delivery, and Freight
summary: Uber Technologies Inc. (NYSE:UBER) is one of the best stocks to buy, according to billionaire Bill Ackman. On January 20, KeyBanc Capital Markets lowered its price target on Uber (NYSE:UBER) to $105 from $110, while maintaining an Overweight rating, citing a more cautious valuation amid uncertainty around autonomous vehicles. The firm highlighted Uber’s dominant 64% […]
